data.title: How do I get consoles?
data.meta_description: For Animal Crossing: New Leaf on the 3DS, a GameFAQs message board topic titled "How do I get consoles?".
data.text:
joserics 7 years ago#1

How do I get the WII U and the 3ds?

Switch FC: 5693-5098-1311

DocChloroplast 7 years ago#2

Randomly from Fortune Cookies or by buying them from the RVs of special characters (Isabelle, Timmy and Tommy, etc).

NNID: drgdgrana | SW-3997-7924-1188 | David @ Calantha (ACNH)

3DS: 1204-0469-8787 | PSN: ghostscreamer

joserics (Topic Creator)7 years ago#3

Chaos Genesis posted...

Randomly from Fortune Cookies or by buying them from the RVs of special characters (Isabelle, Timmy and Tommy, etc).

Thank you!

Switch FC: 5693-5098-1311

Robot2600 7 years ago#4

Awesome, did not know this.

April 15, 2024: The Day the Internet Died

hellokittygirl1 7 years ago#5

The special character RVs have different custom 3DS models as well.

SW-3661-4728-3501 Button, Pie Island

Mayor Anzac of Aussie Dream Code: 6900-2332-8545

joserics (Topic Creator)7 years ago#6

hellokittygirl1 posted...

The special character RVs have different custom 3DS models as well.

You got that RVs from the amiibos and the cards, right? D:

Switch FC: 5693-5098-1311

arleas 7 years ago#7

I've got Isabelle and Mabel Able's figurines and they both have special 3DS models, but you can barely tell any difference from looking at it (it's too small).

http://steamsignature.com/profile/english/76561197969913402.png http://i.imgur.com/VHKOxqN.png

hellokittygirl1 7 years ago#8

joserics posted...

hellokittygirl1 posted...

The special character RVs have different custom 3DS models as well.

You got that RVs from the amiibos and the cards, right? D:

Yep but you can ask to visit other peoples towns on the trade board and order from specific RVs

@arleas the one I like best is the HHD 3DS XL, it's really cute and I have it IRL :D

SW-3661-4728-3501 Button, Pie Island

Mayor Anzac of Aussie Dream Code: 6900-2332-8545

arleas 7 years ago#9

hellokittygirl1 posted...

the one I like best is the HHD 3DS XL

I wasn't aware they had one themed for HHD in the game, but I looked it up on Moridb... I don't have Lottie's amiibo figure... maybe I'll get one if it goes on sale.

I've already got Isabelle (summer outfit), Celeste, Kicks, Tommy&Timmy, Mabel, Tom Nook (those last two were sold really cheap one day on amazon)

And I also have the Squid Girl and Gannondorf figurines for Inkwell and Ganon's stuff... Apparently not everyone has special 3DS models though. OH I forgot about this... Mabel has a 3DS for Mabel AND Sable...

http://steamsignature.com/profile/english/76561197969913402.png http://i.imgur.com/VHKOxqN.png
